participants.name: Linda Mahoney McVey
participants.description: Administrative Assistant at RE/MAX Fine Properties

messages.message:
Linda
I just noticed that Crystal is in a relationship.  Does she change boyfriends like underwear?  Is it you or someone else?  I am worried about you.

Brian
She hooked up with a new guy at my party last weekend.  Whatever.  I have been seeing this girl, a math major, but her name doesn't start with a C!  She is sweet, and very small, but kind of shy so I am not sure where it will go.

Linda
Is he a friend of yours?
Sign up for the Hawaiian miles program and then tell me your password and I will go in and reclaim the missing miles.

Linda
You should send dad a note that you will take him out to lunch for his birthday, you forgot to call....last Monday!  I know he isn't your dad, but he loves you like a son...

Love,
MOM

Linda
Hi there,

I was on your website this morning.  Just a few comments, your employment history should be listed as most recent to least recent.  You should also show that you have been working since you were 15.  Shows ambition.  The other area is the references.  You should never list a family member as a reference.  In the interview you can tell the person that you worked for your dad and he could reference you, but it doesn't look credible on the resume without explanation.

Brian
Good call, I am surprised the other 2 guys I asked didn't mention the order of the employment history, but I like that better since my work at cefns sounds the best and is the longest.  My dad also recommended using someone else's name for my work at national sign so I will change that.  The working since age 15 isn't that important to me because I already have some great jobs to list that are relevant to my field.

Linda
good job, it looks really nice.  Now you may want to clean up facebook in case any future employers check it out!  Love you!

Linda
I guess you went paintballing.  You seem to have a lot of flexible income?  I got a message from Suzie Dodge, Cale's mom.  He graduated last December in Aeronautical Engineering and is applying at Lowe's and Ace Hardware because he hasn't been able to find a job.  Missy graduated in Chemistry and also has no job, so you better get as many applications out as possible.

Brian
Yeah working on it.  Kind of a birthday present from dad, I've always wanted one, I'll spend 2 weeks paying it off.  I've been sitting at Engineering 30 hours a week.  Just been trying to have some fun since classes are easy and I am otherwise a pretty miserable person.

Linda
YOu are not a miserable person.  Don't think that way, you are smart, adorable, sweet, and handsome.

Linda
Today is your dad's birthday so call his cell phone as he is in Vegas on business, leave a message if he doesn't pick up...love you!

Linda
How come I shared your halloween pics on my profile but none of my friends can see them?

Brian
Not sure, my privacy settings should be friends of friends.

Linda
hey babe, I hope you sent thank you notes.  Even a quick note in the mail will be remembered by your family and friends!

Brian
I need addresses.

Linda
Tell me who you need and I will email addresses tomorrow babe.

Linda
you going skydiving?  Thought you might be in Columbus instead...talk soon babe

Linda
Uncle dave sent you a thank note, feels like a gift card inside

Brian
oh. cool.

Linda
Want to go to Joseph Banks for some Christmas pants tomorrow at 9?  Dad is going to get Andrew a suit.  Make sure you know your size.

Linda
Attachment Unavailable
This attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

Linda
http://www.12news.com/story/money/2016/01/31/couple-goes-anti-spending-binge-saves-big/79602834/

Brian
BORING!!
doing a 1000 piece puzzle instead of yachting with friends, give me a break.
This article was written by an advertisement
You get news from artificially intelligent ads

Linda
Brisket is cooking and will be ready whenever you guys get here tonight!

Brian
Woohoo!

Linda
Brownies too!

Brian
Wow nice

Linda
I love you

Brian
https://www.generosity.com/emergencies-fundraising/send-brian-and-iga-to-tahiti-for-great-success--2/x/15204496
Send Brian and Iga to Tahiti for great success!
Support 'Send Brian and Iga to Tahiti for great success!' by donating or sharing today!
generosity.com
What do you think?

Linda
Your latest post may not be attractive to potential employers.  I hate to see you alienate people.  Think of all the people that will see that?

Brian
Fuck them

Brian
1 out of 100 companies won't check it

Linda
Okay you are right.  I am happy you are okay with everyone thing you are hateful.

Brian
maybe you should talk to him since he hung up on me earlier and tell him the truth

Linda
Everyone "thinking"

Brian
Doesn't matter.
Definitely doesn't matter what I think, you and Steve have proved that to me.

Linda
Like I said earlier, when you are man enough for a personal conversation, we will resolve things.  Until then let's avoid arguing on texts.  I will not offer any more advice, I apologize.

Brian
So you've waited this long to have this conversation because you don't think I am man enough to talk about it?
Now you sound like Steve.

Linda
We have been waiting on you to reach out, we didn't want to overstep any boundaries.

Brian
So donate and get your compliment.

Linda
Tim had prostate cancer so no shave november for prostate cancer

Brian
Isn't the person not shaving supposed to tell people what it's for?
What did Chase have?

Linda
Nothing just the supportive beard

Linda
We did buy tickets for Dave Ramsey in April, just to let you know

Brian
Us too?

Linda
Yes we have a total of 6

Brian
Chris Pascal?

Linda
Sure we have 2 extra so whoever you like

Brian
Awesome.  We can ask Jaime too if you don't have anyone in mind, what day?

Linda
End of april.  Will look it up.
April 28th, 8:30 am all day event.  Bunch of speakers.
April 29 th sorry, saturday

Brian
Awesome!  Thank you mom.

Linda
Found this interesting, could this apply to you?  
http://thoughtcatalog.com/lauren-jarvis-gibson/2017/01/11-things-people-dont-realize-youre-doing-because-of-your-high-functioning-anxiety/
. Love you!
11 Things People Don’t Realize You’re Doing Because Of Your High Functioning Anxiety
Anxiety doesn’t care about how happy we are or what is going on in our lives. It is always there. No matter what we do, no matter where we are, and no matter who we are with, it can happen at…
thoughtcatalog.com

Brian
Yup

Linda
I am sorry.  What can I do for you?

Brian
Don't take it personally

Linda
Well of course as the person who carried you for 9 months, I blame myself for something I did "wrong" while you were in my intimate care.

Brian
You didn't
Are you a member of aridus?

Linda
No cause I have never heard of it

Brian
Can Colleen stay at your place the weekend of the 18th?

Linda
Next week?  Saturday is the 21st?

Brian
Yeah

Linda
Marv and Dea are coming saturday and they will be in the casita, so what are the days they need to be here?  They coming Wed?

Brian
I think Saturday through Wednesday

Brian
Thumbs Up Sign

Brian
So maybe we will take them to Flagstaff and Sedona and have a little staycation.

Linda
I sure hope your work folks are not seeing your posts!  Take it easy.  #professionalsuicide

Brian
No, I didn't friend them this time.

Linda
Did you have to come home to work today?

Linda
These 10 brutal truths about life will help you get your shit together
If you’re like me, you get annoyed at the “fairy tale” successful life stories. They usually go something like this: – I had a dream.…
thepowerofideas.ideapod.com

Linda
Not an insult I just thought it was an interesting article

Brian
Just seeing this.  Since I use facebook from my browser on my phone (anti-app) I can't check messages and I forget on my desktop.

Linda
Just thought it was a good read!

Brian
Can you go through dads picture library and pick a photo of me and company (friends) from every trip?  I'll crawl Facebook automatically so if you think its posted skip it.  The pictures dad sent me are only of me younger but I thought we had some from each trip with Rohweders, etc?

Brian
Unless you deleted me.  Sad...

Linda
Lol, we have a huge library of pictures.

Brian
I got the Sad.. part from Trump's tweets, he's a genius, 
https://www.theverge.com/2017/6/26/15872904/trump-tweet-psychology-sad-moral-emotional-words
New study explains why Trump’s ‘Sad’ tweets are so effective
During his campaign and presidency, Donald Trump has used Twitter to circumvent traditional media broadcasters and speak directly to the masses. He is particularly known for one specific tweet...
theverge.com

Brian
I thought if our family was more cooperative I could save my parents from death: 
https://www.netflix.com/watch/80104625?trackId=13752289&tctx=0%2C3%2C5b70227a-30b3-40c9-a66e-95b41c490aab-44000747
Black Mirror | Netflix Official Site
This sci-fi anthology series explores a twisted, high-tech near-future where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.
netflix.com
Does that go straight to the episode?

Linda
It took me to install netflix on my phone

Linda
Dog sitting my tiger pup with Ewok Borgore.
Linda Mahoney McVey

Brian
So cute!

Linda
Yep he was so little and cute...still is.  Are you in CA?

Linda
Thought you might enjoy this!

cool

Linda
Is Iga taking her test yet?  I am praying for her.  Hope you guys had fun!

Brian
right now she is
they required a pencil and we didn't have one and the dollar store across the street only takes cash
lame, i think she will be alright.

Linda
Lol
How late will she be?

Brian
hopefully not more than another hour then we get drive through and come home
LA sucks
I can't go south of malibu from now on.

Linda
Yeah Malibu is too nice

Linda
